      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Game.addBarToListOfMovedBarsInRound(Bar bar)
      This method adds a bar to the list of bars moved by the opponents in the previous round.

      This method adds a bar to the list of bars moved in two previous rounds.
      void Game.refreshBeads(Bar bar)
      This method updates the status of all the affected beads once a bar has been moved, based on its coordinates.
      void Game.refreshBoard(Bar bar)
      This method sets new values for each slot in the board (column or row), if it's a horizontal move (RED bars), updates only the value in the slot (to RED or BLACK), if the previous one it's not blue (BLUE covers all the possible colors behind it).

    • Uses of Bar in it.polimi.group03.engine

      Methods in it.polimi.group03.engine with parameters of type Bar 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private StatusMessage GameValidator.validateBarPositionMove(Bar selectedBar, BarPosition targetPosition)
      This method checks the intended movement of the bar with respect of the final position.
      private StatusMessage GameValidator.validateConsecutiveBarMove(Bar selectedBar)
      This method checks the movement that a player tries to do when there are only two players left in the game, in order to do it validates the selected bar against the bars slid in the two previous turns of the player.
      StatusMessage GameValidator.validateMove(Bar selectedBar, BarPosition targetPosition, Player currentPlayer)
      This method checks whether the movement a player is trying to do complies with the rules established for the game.
      private StatusMessage GameValidator.validateSelectedBarMove(Bar selectedBar)
      This method checks that the bar selected by the player was not slid by any of his/her opponents in the previous turn.
